Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>Colin,
>
>In trying to run your OCR experiment, fitness stayed flat at 0 for 
>over 1,000 generations.  Any idea why this might be?  Perhaps I need 
>to use a particular activation function style or some other 
>parameter is critical that isn't set by default?
>
>ken
>  
>
Ok, I omitted one important fact in the write-up, which is that I 
alwqays started out with a population of genomes with no connections at 
all. Thr reason for this is that using fully conected genomes does not 
give good results (as you observed), whereas starting awith no structure 
seemed to work well. You could also try starting with a small proportion 
of connections, just set the conncetion proportion value accordingly 
when you create the population.

Actually in the long run any excess structures will be removed in the 
first pruning phase, but witha fully connected population that first 
phase can take a few minutes to come around.

Colin.
